Electronic Music Studio

Digital Audio Production & Sound Design

Creating electronic music across multiple genres and styles. From ambient soundscapes to driving rhythms, each track showcases different approaches to synthesis, sampling, and digital audio production.

Electro

Futuristic Detroit electro with machine funk and robotic rhythms

Machine Funk • Robotic Rhythms • Future Sound

Ambient

Atmospheric soundscapes and immersive sonic environments

Soundscapes • Textures • Atmospheric

Melodic

Harmonic progressions and emotional electronic compositions

Harmonies • Emotions • Progressions

Breaks

Breakbeat rhythms and chopped-up drum patterns

Breakbeats • Chopped Drums • Rhythmic

The Waveform Generation

Electronic Music Production • Toronto, Canada
